author: RTÉ News
title: Chinese human rights lawyer released after five years
description: A leading Chinese human rights lawyer has been released from prison after almost five years behind bars, his wife has said.
content:
A leading Chinese human rights lawyer has been released from prison after almost five years behind bars, his wife has said.
Wang Quanzhang, 44, was first detained in 2015 in a sweeping crackdown on more than 200 lawyers and government critics in China as Pre… [+3526 chars]
